entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is lying on the floor when Tonks arrives. He is described as being in a state of utter astonishment and has a bruised foot.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: A person who is walking towards Harry Potter, looking thinner than usual and with lank mouse-coloured hair. She claims to be on her way to see Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of the castle, who has gone away again according to Tonks. Harry Potter is trying to find him in his office.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and Tonks are interacting with each other, with Tonks arriving at the scene where Harry is lying on the floor. They have a conversation about Dumbledore's whereabouts.
Harry Potter is searching for Dumbledore, trying to find him in his office. Tonks also mentions that she wants to see Dumbledore about some rumors and people getting hurt.
Tonks is also searching for Dumbledore, claiming that she wants to see him about some rumors and people getting hurt. However, she does not know where he has gone.
